group_1.textCenter: [chara:103701:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]S-somehow I managed to return@before Rabi did,
and took care of gutting the fish.
...I still need to cook it, don't I?
All of this work has been so mentally draining@that I should take a break.
It's currently...4:00 PM...
There is still a little time, so I will take@a break after checking the mailbox.
There could be new leads on Papa.
(Nothing from the credit bureau has arrived.)
(However, there is a strange piece@of paper here...)
What could this be?
Neither an envelope nor a postcard, just a single@sheet of paper sent directly to me...
Ah, something is written on the back.

group_1.narration: I finally found you, Rabi Himuro.@I never imagined you would be@a servant at a place like this.
Seems like your annoying roommate@is pretty busy, too.@You're not getting away.
Let's meet, just the two of us.@I'll be waiting at the place@this evening.
And if you don't come...@Well, I don't need to write@that part down, do I?

group_1.textCenter: (Ah, this was addressed to Rabi.@I read it by accident.)
(My, could this be a letter@from an intimate partner?)
"Annoying roommate"...?
(This is referring to me?)
(Rabi and her friend have been calling me@"annoying" behind my back...?)
(How dare she...!)
(...No, Rabi is not a person of poor character@like that.)
(That's right...)
(This letter...thinking about it, there are@several strange things about this.)
(To send a letter like this nowadays...)
(If they wished to meet, they would@have messaged each other...)
(Does this person not have Rabi's@phone number...?)
(Yet they know the location of her home...?)
(It's suspicious...)
For now...I should call her...@[chara:103701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]But if I contact Rabi right now...
Then...
Ah, hello, Mikage?
